snippet.title: Puppet Master: The Game - DEV VLOG - 12/13/22
snippet.description:
#puppetmaster  #asymmetrical  #horrorgaming #multiplayer 

WISHLIST TODAY!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/17...

FOLLOW US!
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/PuppetMasterTG
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/Octobergames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/octobergame...

JOIN OR DISCORD
https://discord.gg/aqAMKHP

It’s been an amazing honor to work with Full Moon Features. It’s crazy to think that our little fan-game from 10 years ago would evolve into the official game of the series, it's been a real dream come true. 

We want to thank everyone for their patience, there’s so much going on behind the scenes. We thought it would be important to get everyone up to speed on some of what we’ve been working on. 


Single Player
First, we would like to announce that Puppet Master: The Game will be releasing in OPEN BETA on March 1st of 2023! I know, sadly we won't be releasing this year like we said in the announcement trailer, but there’s a good reason for that!

Come March 1st, Puppet Master: The Game will include a new game mode called Toulon’s Journals. A single player sandbox mode where you can complete challenges, fight bad-guys, earn experience points, and best of all, find lost pages of Andre Toulon’s.

The Journal pages act as an audio log that you can discover in the game’s environments. Finding one allows you to hear Andre Toulon as he recalls his History with the puppets all  while while you play. You’ll also be able to listen to them at your own convenience outside of the game once they’ve been unlocked.

Toulon’s Journals were written by Nat Brehmer, author of Puppet Master Complete, a Franchise History. Let me tell you, that Nat did an amazing job honoring the History of franchise while adding some fun new details about the Puppet’s past. We can’t wait to share what he has written with you when Toulon’s Journal releases next year.


Bot Support
Another feature we have been working on is adding Human BOT SUPPORT. This will allow you to play all of our Future Human vs Puppet game modes as either a Solo or Coop experience. 

That's it for me, thank you for your support, Happy Holidays, stay safe!
Oh and Wishlist Puppet Master: The Game on steam!
